title: Love in the Cards
description: A mysterious invitation...Dacre House. A decadent Garden District mansion on Halloween night. Some are here to work, some to play, but all are here for a reason. Will old lovers reunite? Ancient conflicts be forgiven? Can strangers enter the house alone and leave as mates? How valuable is a friendship? What would they do to keep--or lose--a job? The answers are in the cards. Love in the Cards. Ten naughty stories of love and lust from the ladies of Love, Lust, and Laptops.
author: Becca Jameson
